text: Emma Riff (born 14 December 2000) is a French modern pentathlete. She participated at the 2018 World Modern Pentathlon Championships, winning a medal.Mixed relay results ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:2000 births Category:French female modern pentathletes Category:World Modern Pentathlon Championships medalists Category:Modern pentathletes at the 2018 Summer Youth Olympics
title: Emma Riff
